message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,450,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to make a bit more on this product. I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000.  This still leaves some room for profit for me while being a good deal for you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,350,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
